texts.en: Josefina is a married woman and a mother of two children. Josefina is 58 years old, residing at Labinay, Ozamis City in Philippines. She owns and operates a retail business. She sells a variety of different products for a living and she's been 7 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 9,000.00 to purchase additional goods/products to sell. Josefina become a member of GDMPC in the year 2010. In the future, Josefina wants to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods/products to sell

loans.name: Gulayim

texts.ru: Гулаим  59 лет, вдова. В 1980 году, в поисках источника финансирования своей семьи, Гулаим начала свой бизнес в разведении скота .Использовав стартовую сумму в 5,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, Гулаим сумела развить свое хозяйство, с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме около 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулаим обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы  и теленка. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Гулаим планирует увеличивать поголовье  скота.
texts.en: Gulayim is a 59 year old widow. In 1980, in search of a source of income for her family Gulayim decided to open a livestock business. She used a starting capital of 5000 som (KGS) to purchase a few animals and has since grown and improved the business to yield 4000 som (KGS) monthly profits. In order to further develop her enterprise, Gulayim has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use this loan to purchase another dairy cow with calf. In the future, Gulayim is hoping to use the profits from the loan to purchase even more animals for her herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Panoramica Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PANORAMICA II” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada donde la señora Estela es la presencia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de galletas, taller de zapatos, venta de mantas, tejido de chompas, venta de condimentos, elaboración de mantas de awayos, venta de verduras.

La señora Estela  indica que este es el tercer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su Amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de mantas que viene trabajando hace años atrás.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de mantas) que comprará de la Ceja y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The community association 'PANORAMICA II' will start their first cycle in 'Pro Mujer', as a part of  'Centro Senkata'. The group is made up of nine members and is directed by a board of directors, the head of which is Estela. The businesses that the members of the community association are involved with vary and include: selling cookies, a shoe shop, selling blankets, weaving sweaters, selling spices, making traditional blankets (aguayos), and selling vegetables. 

Estela said that this is the third time she has worked with 'Pro Mujer', first entering when she was invited by a friend. She has a business in which she sells blankets that she started years ago. 

The loan which she is currently requesting is to increase her capital, for the purchase of blankets that she will buy in Ceja and later will resell them in her market stall. This business allows her to make income, to be able to support her family. She is married and has two children. 

When she was asked what she likes about 'Pro Mujer' she said she likes the area of health.

loans.use: Compra de mantas

loans.name: Abdulrazaq

texts.en:
Abdulrazaq is 28 years old, a married man with two children. He lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He attended high school but couldn`t study at the university because he didn`t have anyone to support him. He has worked very hard for many years to get his family ahead and give them everything they deserve. He has a grocery and it is his main source of income.

He started his business 8 years ago. His business was initially a cafe that didn`t require a large amount of capital but it was not running well enough to make much profit. Then, he was planning to develop his business so he sold his own land which was located in his village and therefore he opened a grocery.

His business is located in a very strategic area. Many people prefer his store because he always has the basic staples at affordable prices, and he provides the best possible customer service. His dream is to see his store flourish.  Due to the current bad situation in Yemen,  he has less profit from his enterprise. So, he took a youth loan of 100,000 YER to stock his business with more products so that his customers would always find what they need and keep coming back.

In the future, he would like expand his business in order to purchase a call center. With this investment he hopes to be able to get his family ahead and give them better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to stock more products so that customers will always find what they need.

loans.name: Moharm

texts.en:
Moharm is 27 years old, single and lives in Taiz, Yemen.

He completed secondary school only. He is a carpenter. He has been operating a carpentry shop for 13 years, which is his principal source of income. In the beginning, he inherited this business from his father and become the unique successor in his family. He is an incredibly hard-working man and, as a result, has a lot of experience. Through lots of effort, he has managed to make cupboards and doors, which provide him with the income necessary. Due to the bad situation in Yemen, he suffers from increasing prices from the market where he purchases wood.

Moharm took a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase Carpentry equipments  which will increase the sales for his business.  

In the future, he hopes to expand his business to have a construction company so he can import and export woods around the provinces of Yemen and he hopes to get married.

loans.use: to purchase carpentry equipment

loans.name: Ian

texts.en:
Ian is a fifty-seven-year-old man. He is widowed and the father of five children but supports two only. He sells firewood and charcoal in Limuru. Ian has been in this business for five years now and gets a monthly income of eighty thousand shillings.

This will be Ian’s sixth loan with KADET Ltd.  He plans to use the entire loan to expand on his business by buying more firewood and charcoal for sale.

With the profit that he will get, he wants to open a timber yard and a charcoal store at Kabuku town. In future he wants to become a successful businessman.

loans.use: to expand on his firewood and charcoal business

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 31 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She’s married and her husband is a builder. They have two children, one of whom lives at home and attends school.

Annie has had her business for 5 years and she operates a cook shop (restaurant).  She was taught how to run the business by her elder sister.  Her main challenges are the increases in prices for the things she buys.  She is happy when she sells and when her food is finished on time.

She’s requesting a loan to purchase rice by the bag, peppers, coal by the bag, and an oil container for her cook shop (restaurant) business. She would like to get money to build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase rice by the bag, peppers, coal by the bag, and an oil container for cook shop (restaurant) business

loans.name: Shukur

texts.ru: Шукур проживает в районе Рудаки. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Шукур занимается животноводством. Он разводит скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа скота.
texts.en: Shukur lives in the Rudaki region. He is 50 years old, married and a father of six children. His wife is a home maker. Shukur is providing for his large family by raising cattle for sale. He has a barn in his house for his herd. Shukur has been raising cattle for the last five years and is taking out this loan to purchase more animals for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es: La señora Aracely del Carmen de 53 años es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora  de 53 años quien se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra junto a su esposo con lo cual le proporciono estudios a sus tres hijos que ya son mayores de edad. Ella con el crédito piensa invertir en otros productos como gelatinas, helados, bolis, gaseosas...etc.
texts.en: Aracely del Carmen is 53 years old, she is a hard working woman and an entrepreneur. She makes a living by buying and re-selling snack foods. She runs this business alongside her husband. This allows them to pay for their three children to study, all of whom are adults. With this loan she is going to invest in other products such as gelatins, ice cream, popsicles, soft drinks, etc.

loans.use: to buy gelatins, ice cream, popsicles, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 47 years old and is married with three grown up children aged between 34 and 20 years old.

Leah has a shoe selling business that she has been doing for the past 10 years. She has applied for a loan from KADET Ltd. to enable her to buy more shoes for sale.

She hopes to open up a boutique in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell

loans.name: Estrellitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESTRELLITAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Rebeca. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, venta de masitas, tejidos de chompas, venta de refrescos y golosinas, venta de lana, venta de polleras, tienda de abarrotes.

La señora Rebeca,  indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de su la asesora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de polleras que viene trabajando hace algún tiempo.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de telas) que adquirirá de la Ceja, por mayor, y posteriormente a la elaboración comercializará en Cochabamba. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación.
texts.en:
The “ESTRELLITAS” (Little Stars) communal bank will be starting their first cycle with Pro Mujer as a part of the Santiago II office. The communal bank has seven members. The board of directors is led by Rebeca. The members' businesses include selling food, cakes, sweaters, soft drinks and candy, wool, polleras and running a grocery store.

Rebeca says that this is first time she has worked with Pro Mujer. She became a member through an invitation from her advisor. Currently, she has a business making polleras (Bolivian pleated skirts). She has had this business for some time.

The loan she is taking out now will be used to increase her capital in order to buy wholesale fabrics from La Ceja. After she makes the polleras, she will sell them in Cochabamba. This kind of work allows her to generate income in order to support her family. She has a common-law marriage and three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said that she likes the training.

loans.use: purchase fabric.

loans.name: Famata

texts.en:
Famata is 28 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She is married and has two children who are aged one and four years old.  Her older child attends school.

For the past five years Famata has been selling dishes (plates, cups, saucers and bowls).   She is proud that her business provides for her needs.  She started the business with money given to her by her husband. She is requesting this loan to purchase more dishes (plates, cups, saucers and bowls) for her business.  In the future, she plans is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more dish(plates,cups,saucers, and bowls) her business

loans.name: Miatta

texts.en:
Miatta is 28 years old and lives in Gardnersville.  She attended school and is a high school graduate. She is married and her husband is a tailor.  They have two children. 
 
Maitta sells used clothes, sheets, towels and curtains.  The biggest problem is when business is slow.  She is proud that her business means that they never go hungry.  She started the business with money from her husband.

She’s requesting a loan to purchase more used fabrics (sheets, towels, and curtains) for her business. She would like to enlarge her business.

loans.use: to purchase more used fabrics (sheets, towels, and curtains) for her business.

loans.name: Safarbek

texts.ru: Сафарбек житель района Рудаки. Ему 48 лет. Он уже четыре года как занимается скотоводством. В основном он разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его сын находится в Российской Федерации, а дочь живет отдельно вместе с мужем. Сафарбек просит кредит для закупа мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Safarbek is a resident of Rudaki. He is 48 years old and has been raising livestock for the last four years. Primarily he specializes in raising cattle for meat sales. Safarbek is married and has three children. His son is currently working in Russia and his daughter is married and lives with her own husband. Safarbek is asking for this loan to purchase a few sheep/goats.

loans.use: to purchase sheep/goats

loans.name: Rajab

texts.ru: Рачаб 50 - летний женатый мужчина. У него трое детей. Он занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже четыре года. В основном Рачаб закупает крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Он берет кредит для закупа коровы.
texts.en: Rajab is a 50 year old man and a father of three children. He raises cattle for a living and has been running a profitable livestock business for the last four years. The main focus of his enterprise are meat cattle which he raises from calves to market size animals for sale. Rajab is planning to use this loan to purchase another cow for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy low-cost knickknacks, platic items, shoes, clothing and other items orderd by his customers.

loans.name: Solina

texts.en: Solina is 28 years old. She is married to an entrepreneur. They have three children between 3 and 12 years old. All of the children go to school. Solina started selling fish in mid-December 2011. She wants to use the loan to buy more fish to sell. She plans to buy a house from the profits that will be obtained from the business. She dreams of having various places to sell fish in the future.

loans.use: To buy more fish for sell.

loans.name: Julienne

texts.en: Julienne is aged 60 and she is no longer lives with her partner. They have 6 children aged between 20 and 34.All of her children are enrolled in school. Julienne has been selling clothes for the last 12 years. She has requested the loan to buy more clothes for selling. She plans to use the profits for paying school fees and provide food for the children. In the future, julienne would like to own her house.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for selling.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El  señor Miguel tiene 45 años de edad,  esta casado, tiene 2 hijos  de las edades 13 y 15 años, reside en la comunidad de Cuyamel, Municipio de Omoa.
Don Miguel trabaja como jornalero en una hacienda de su comunidad y además es agricultor, dedicándose a la producción del cultivo de yuca (mandioca). 
Actualmente ha solicitado un crédito de 3000 Lempiras para la compra de insumos y de esta manera  brindar el mantenimiento requerido por el cultivo.
Este es su segundo crédito con la Institución y considera que ha empezado a vivir con su familia en mayor solvencia económica, él espera ahorrar sus ganancias para luego invertir en la construcción de su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Miguel, 45, is married and has two children who are 13 and 15 years old; he lives in the community of Cuyamel, Omoa Municipality.


Miguel works as a day laborer on a local hacienda and is also a farmer producing manioc.  He is asking for a 3000 Lempiras loan to buy supplies to provide required maintenance to his crop.


This is the second loan with the Institution and he believes that he and his family have started to live with better economic solvency.  He hopes to save his profits to use later to build his own house.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel es una mujer emprendedora, amable y trabajadora, tiene 30 años y convive con Betman de 30 años. Juntos tienen tres hijos, Blanca de 17, Carlos de 9 y la menor Luciana de 4 años, y habitan en su casa propia. Ella se esfuerza a diario para asi poder brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Maribel realiza su trabajo de manera muy profesional, pues se dedica a la elaboración de pasteles. Su dedicación se ve en la presentación y el aroma que deja en sus postres, la han convertido en experta y por ello tiene demanda de su trabajo. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por 5 años y tiene la ayuda de su hija a quien intenta enseñar todos los secretos de su negocio. Le gusta mucho lo que hace pues tiene tiempo para poder dedicarse a su familia, además que le genera buenas ganancias. Su plan es ahora formalizar su negocio y consolidarlo. Este será el crédito número 11 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar son sus objetivos, además se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Se siente muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son buenos clientes y muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará ingredientes, insumos y materiales para seguir con la elaboración de más pasteles.
texts.en:
Maribel is an enterprising, kind and hard-working woman. She is 30 years old and she lives with her partner Betman who is also 30. Together they have three children, 17 year old Blanca, 9 year old Carlos and the youngest, Luciana, who is 4 years old. They live in their own house. Everyday she strives to provide her family with better living conditions. Maribel carries out her work in a very professional manner and she makes cakes for a living. Her dedication is evident in the presentation and aroma of her desserts. She has become an expert and therefore there is demand for her work. 

She has been doing this job for 5 years and she is helped by her daughter, who she tries to teach the secrets of her business. She very much enjoys what she does as she has time to devote to her family and she also earns a good income. Her plan is to formalize and strengthen her business. This will be the 11th loan with MFP and she is therefore looking forward to their collaboration, in order to continue with her objectives. She also promises once again to honor her repayments, as she did in her previous loans. She is very happy to be a part of her communal bank as they are all good customers and very responsible people. With the requested amount of 2000 soles, she will buy ingredients, supplies and materials to continue making more cakes.

loans.use: to buy materials to make more cakes.

loans.name: Lucrecia Feliza

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Lucrecia, tiene 52 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 5 hijos todos mayores de edad, tres de ellos que aun están solteros  viven en su casa. Su esposo trabaja de conserje en un colegio.

Ella tiene una panadería en su casa, allí junto a sus hijos todos los días preparan el delicioso pan que es indispensable en la mesa de los habitantes de su ciudad, ellos también prepara tortas y bizcochuelos que son muy apetecidos por sus clientes. Trabajan todos los días, desde las 5h00 que se levantan a hornear el pan para que cuando sus clientes lleguen todo esté listo, su esposo también les ayuda sobre todo los fines de semana cuando está desocupado, llevan en este negocio por más de 10 años y les va muy bien ya que cuentan con muy buena clientela.

Este crédito lo van a utilizar en comprar harina, sal, azúcar, mantequilla, huevos y otros ingredientes necesarios para elaborar el pan. Lleva 6 ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. 

Su sueño es tener otro local en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
The “Calle América” (America Street) communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts which are famous both nationally and internationally; it’s where the famous straw hats come from.

We met Lucrecia, 52, here.  She’s in a common law relationship and has five adult children.  Three of them are still single and live at home.  Her husband works as a caretaker at a school.

She has a home-based bakery.  She and her children prepare delicious bread there daily that’s indispensable for the local residents’ tables; she also makes cakes and sponge cakes that are very much enjoyed by her customers.  They work every day from 5am when they arise to bake bread so that when the customers arrive everything will be ready.  Her husband also helps out on weekends when he’s off work.  They’ve had this business for more than 10 years and they do very well since they have a very good clientele.

They will use the loan to buy flour, salt, sugar, butter, eggs and other necessary ingredients to bake bread.  She’s been in the communal bank for six cycles and she likes it because they help her with loans.  Her dream is to have another locale in the city center.

loans.use: to buy flour, salt, sugar, eggs, butter, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Alexandra

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Calle América se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  16, 12 y 5 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.
 
Ella y su esposo se dedican al comercio, venden ropa de todo tipo y caramelos al por mayor, trabajan todos los días, ellos se desplazan hasta la distribuidora de Confiteca( fabrica de caramelos) donde compran al por mayor y luego se dedican a recorrer las tiendas de su localidad entregando estos productos. La ropa la venden puerta a puerta y la compran en la ciudad de Guayaquil cada vez que necesitan, llevan más de 8 años dedicados a este negocio y es así como ellos han podido salir adelante.
 
Este crédito lo van a utilizar en comprar ropa de todo tipo y caramelos para seguir con su negocio. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal, es la tesorera del grupo y le gusta por los beneficios que recibe del banco.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para realizara sus recorridos.
texts.en:
The “Calle América” (America Street) communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and crafts which are famous both nationally and internationally; it’s where the famous straw hats come from.

We met Rosa, 34, here.  She’s married and has three children who are 16, 12 and 5 years old.  The two oldest attend secondary school and the youngest attends elementary school. Her husband is a merchant.

She and her husband are merchants; they sell all types of clothes and candy at wholesale.  They work every day.  They head out to Confiteca (candy factory) where they buy at wholesale and then visit stores in their locality distributing those products.  The clothes are sold door to door and they buy them in the city of Guayaquil whenever they need to.  They’ve been in this business more than 8 years and this is how they’ve been able to get ahead.

They will use the loan to buy all types of clothes and candy to stay in business.  She’s been in the communal bank since the beginning and is the group’s Treasurer; she likes it because of the benefits she gets from the bank.  Her dream is to have a car to make her rounds in.

loans.use: to buy clothes and candy.

loans.name: Amada  Mauricia

texts.es:
La  señorita amada Mauricia  se dedica a la venta de dulces desde hace tres años es una persona trabajadora que le gusta cumplir sus  sueños y luchar por lo que quiere  que es tener un local donde pueda trabajar  y atender a sus clientes y ofrecerles dulces por mayoreo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas dulces para la venta como son: pulpas jugos ,paletas ,sabritas ,galletas,chicleks y juguetitos.
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudar a las personas con sueños y con las garras para cumplirlos y tener su propio negocio y trabajarlo para que en el futuro de frutos.
texts.en:
Señorita Amada Mauricia has been working selling sweets for the last three years.  She is a hard-working person, who enjoys accomplishing her dreams and strives for what she wants, which is to have premises where she can work and serve her customers, and offer sweets at wholesale.

She has asked for the loan for the purchase of more sweets to sell, such as juices, popsicles, potato chips, cookies, gum and little toys.

She gives thanks to the foundation for helping people with their dreams and with the opportunity to accomplish them, and allowing her to have her own business and work in it to bear fruit in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sweets for sale.

loans.name: Jyldyzkan

texts.ru:
Жылдызкан 45 лет, замужем, воспитывает  четверых детей. В поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, в 1995 году Жылдызкан начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания. Стартовав с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS), Жылдызкан благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  5,000 сом (KGS). Также, имеет в хозяйстве две дойные коровы, что также является источником дохода для семьи. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса в торговле, Жылдызкан обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента.  Доходы от кредита Жылдызкан планирует вложить в  дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса, а в будущем – планирует развивать как торговлю, так и животноводство в целях взаимного пополнения в несезонное время .
texts.en:
Jyldyzkan is 45 years old, married and is raising four children. To support her large family Jyldyzkan opened a grocery store in 1995. With a starting capital of 5,000 som (KGS) and a lot of hard work and perseverance Jyldyzkan expanded her business to yield 5,000 som (KGS) monthly profits. Aside from the grocery store the household also has two milk cows and the dairy sales provide an additional source of income for the family. 

In order to further expand her business by expanding her grocery inventory, Jyldyzkan has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS). She is going to invest the profits from this expansion to improve her grocery business. In the future Jyldyzkan is planning to develop both the grocery and dairy sales so that the two enterprises can support each other during the down seasons.

loans.use: to broaden the assortment of goods

loans.name: Jumakhon

texts.ru: Чумахон занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он три года. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Чумахон берет кредит для закупа семян.
texts.en: Jumakhon is a farmer and has been growing wheat for the last three years. He is 37 years old, married and has five children. Jumakhon is taking out this loan to purchase seeds for the upcoming planting season.

loans.use: to plant wheat

loans.name: Kutbiddin

texts.ru: Кутбиддин проживает в городе Кургантюбе. Ему 31 год. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии он не работает. Он открыл столовую, где более 2 лет работает поваром. Целью получения кредита является покупка продуктов для приготовления европейских блюд.
texts.en: Kutbiddin lives in the city of Qurgan-Tube. He is 31 years old, married and has two children. His wife is a home maker. Kutbiddin himself has a college degree in education but he does not work in the field anymore. Instead, two years ago Kutbiddin has opened his own cafe where he works as a chef. He is taking out this loan to purchase bulk groceries for preparation of Western dishes.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for his cafe

loans.name: Union San Jeronimo Group

texts.es:
La señora Antonieta nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (En la fotografía la señora Antonieta está levantando la mano). Antonieta tiene 35 años edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. Antonieta es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia y aparte de ser ama de casa también se dedica a la venta de carteras. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a la elaboración de carteras y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella también tiene una péquela tienda de venta de ropa y venta de carteras. En esta oportunidad Antonieta requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales para elaboración de cartera y para comprar más ropa. Su sueño de Antonieta es abrir una pollería y también vende en el mismo local comestibles.   

El banco comunal “Unión San Jeronimo”  está conformado por 10 personas responsables y trabajadores. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Antonieta was born in the city of Cuzco, and still lives there. (In the photograph, Antonieta has her hand raised.) Antonieta is thirty-five years old and lives in a common law marriage, from which she has one child. Antonieta is an enterprising and hard-working woman who helps her family to get ahead. In addition to being a homemaker, she also makes handbags. She has four years’ experience making handbags, and thanks to the determination she brings to her work, her business is doing well. She also has a small store where she sells clothes along with her handbags. At this time, Antonieta is soliciting a loan to purchase materials to produce handbags, and also to purchase more clothing to sell. Her dream is to open a poultry store where she can also sell groceries.

The communal bank “Unión San Jeronimo” [Saint Geronimo Union] is made up of ten responsible and hard-working individuals. The majority of its members live in the city of Cuzco, where their economic activities take place. Cuzco is known as a place with lots of tourists, a center of commerce, and for its traditional Inti Raymi celebration. It is also where one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu, can be found.

loans.use: to purchase materials to produce handbags, and also to purchase more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Yemy

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” está conformado por personas responsables y trabajadores que sacan adelante a su familia. La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

Yemy tiene 33 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo,el nació en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco departamento del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal de Yemy alquila un taxi a S/25.00 nuevos soles por día desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, el alquila el taxi porque su carro esta en mantenimiento. Ya son varios años que se dedica a brindar servicio de transportes y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Yemy requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Andrés Avelino Cáceres” (Andrés Avelino Cáceres, born in 1836, is a national hero and 3-time president of Peru) is made up of dependable workers who are bringing up their families. Most of the members live in the city of Cusco where they conduct their economic activities. Cusco is known for its popular tourist zone, commercialism, and for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi (Festival of the Sun) and because it has one of the seven wonders of the world “Machupicchu.”

Yemy is 33 years old and has a common-law relationship from which he has a son. He was born in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco and lives in the same city where he was born. His main work activity is a taxi, and he is renting one at S/25.00 nuevos soles per day from 7:00 in the morning until 7:00 in the evening. He rents the taxi because his car needs to be repaired. He has been in the transport business for some years and it is going very well. At this time Yemy is asking for a loan in order to repair his car.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his taxi

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES UNIDAS”, que se encuentra situado en el distrito de San Sebastian en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Sonia tiene 49 años de edad es soltera y tiene 2 hijos, Ls socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con la administración de su taller de confecciones de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños; la socia tambien confecciona ropa para cama, ella compra al por mayor todo tipo de telares y de hilos para implementar su taller, en esta ocasión la socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de telas al por mayor y de hilos, botones en diferentes tamaños, entre otros.

La socia agradece y expresa su satisfacción de poder seguir creciendo con su negocio propio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago  de su deuda en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sonia belongs to the communal bank "MUJERES UNIDAS" (Women United). She is originally from the city of Cusco.

Sonia is 49 years old, single and has two children. She combines her household chores with the administration of her workshop where she makes clothing for men, women and children. She also makes bedding. She buys all her fabrics and threads wholesale to stock her workshop. On this occasion she is requesting a loan to invest in buying  fabric, threads, different size buttons and other items wholesale.

She is grateful and expresses her satisfaction at being able to continue growing with her own business. She is committed to making her payments within the required time period.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, different size buttons and other items wholesale

loans.name: Araceli

texts.es:
La señorita  Araceli  es trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos como son: entomatadas, enchiladas, sopes, tacos dorados y tacos blanditos.
También se dedica a la venta de dulces en una escuela primaria.
La señorita Araceli  nos cuenta que desde hace dos años se ha dedicado a la vende antojitos mexicanos ya que es buen negocio y le deja buenas ganancias.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más dulces para la venta.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudar a los jovenes que desean superarse.
texts.en:
Señorita  Araceli is a hard-working woman who works selling Mexican snacks such as entomatadas (stuffed tortillas cooked in tomato sauce), enchiladas, soups, tacos dorados (stuffed tacos fried until crispy) and tacos blanditos (soft shell tacos).  She also works selling sweets in a primary school.

Señorita Araceli tells us that for the last twelve years, she has worked selling Mexican snacks, as it is a good business and earns her good profits.

She has asked for the loan for the purchase of more sweets to sell.

She gives thanks to the foundation for supporting young people who want to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase sweets to sell.

loans.name: Minakhan

texts.ru: Минахон  57 лет, вдова, воспитала шестерых детей.  В качестве  основного источника дохода для семьи, Минахон развивает животноводство, начатое с покупки коровы. На сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS)  в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Минахон обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы Минахон планирует вложить в ремонт дома, а в будущем -  в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Minakhan is a 57-year-old widow who has raised six children. As the main source of income for her family, Minakhan is developing her livestock business, which began with a purchase of a single cow. Today, her farm earns around 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products. In order to further expand her business, Minakhan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase sheep. Minakhan plans to use her profits to repair her home, and in the future - to continue purchasing additional livestock.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Solohidin

texts.ru: Солохидин занимается животноводством у себя дома. Он откармливает и продает скот. Этим видом бизнеса занимается год. Ему 51 год. У него четверо детей. Его жена занимается растениеводством. Он сам помогает жене в продвижении ее деятельности. Кредит берет для закупа скота.
texts.en: Solohidin raises livestock at home. He fattens and resells farm animals. He has been in this business for one year. He is 51 years old. His wife farms produce. He also helps his wife in her work. He is taking out a loan to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Isidra

texts.es:
La señora Isidra es una persona trabajadora, triunfadora con muchos deseos por cumplir.
Tiene la cantidad de tres hijas que son unas  muchachas  triunfadoras.
Ella se dedica a la venta de pollos y a la venta de dulces y galletas  desde hace tres años  y lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es pelar los pollos y regalarles una patita de pollo a sus clientes.
Tambien se dedica ala elaboracion de bolsas de hilos de estanbre.
Ella  pidió el préstamo para la compra de más dulces para la venta, aunque aquí es donde va a invertir mas tambien destinara algo para la compra de hilos para la elaboracion de bolsas, así podrá diversificar el crédito.
texts.en:
Isidra is a hardworking, successful woman with many goals to reach.  She has three daughters who are also successful young women.  She has sold chickens, candy and cookies for three years and what she likes best about her work is plucking the chickens and giving her customers a free chicken foot.  She also makes yarn purses.

She asked for the loan to buy more candy to sell; this is where she’s going to invest the most.  But she also will use some of the money to buy yarn to make the purses thus diversifying her loan.

loans.use: to buy candy to sell, yarn to make purses and chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine,  fabric and raw materials

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
La señora Feliciana  es una persona trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de tacos de tripa de res, cecina, chorizó, lengua  de res, cabeza de res y campechano  y a la venta aguas de coco bien fria.
También se dedica  a la venta de tamales de pollo, marrano.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra  ingredientes como es: carne de res, verduras para la ensalada, cocos para la elavoracion de agua y maiz para la elaboracion de tortillas  y  compra de hojas de plátano, pollos, chiles  y manteca para la elaboración de tamales.
Le da las gracias a fundación por apoyarla.
texts.en:
Feliciana is a hardworking person who sells beef tripe tacos, cecina [dried beef], chorizo, beef tongue, beef head and ‘campechanas’ [type of grilled meat tacos]; she also sells ice cold coconut water and chicken and pork tamales.

She requested the loan to buy ingredients like beef, vegetables for salad, coconuts for the coconut water and corn to make tortillas; she will also buy banana leaves, chickens, chilies and lard to make tamales.  She thanks the Fundación for supporting her.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tamales.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La señora María Elena   es una señora creativa  y trabajadora se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos y a la venta  de bolsas para dama.
Tiene la cantidad de tres hijos dos mujeres y un varón por quien trabaja ya que desea darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
También se dedica a la venta quesos por mayoreo y menudeo.
Ella  nos cuenta que lo que mas vende de antojitios mexicanos es el cando de pescado y el caldo de pollo y lo que son tacos dorados, empanadas y enchiladas.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de aros y molino para moler la cuajada para la elaboración de quesos.
texts.en:
María Elena is a creative, hardworking woman who sells traditional Mexican fast food items and women’s purses.  She has three children, two girls and a boy that she works hard for because she wants to give them a better future.   She also sells cheese at wholesale and retail.

She tells us that the traditional Mexican fast food items she sells the most of are fish soup and chicken soup as well as deep fried tacos, turnovers and enchiladas.

She requested the loan to buy ring molds and a mill to grind the curd to make the cheese.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make cheese, women's purses and traditional Mexican fast food items.

loans.name: Manuela Yolanda

texts.es:
La señora Manuela Yolanda propietaria de un negocio de venta de refrescos naturales y gaseosas la cual vende en la terminal de buses de León. Su día de trabajo inicia desde las 5 de la mañana hora en la que se traslada a efectuar las compras de los productos que utilizará en la elaboración de los diferentes tipos de refrescos naturales posteriormente se traslada a su negocio donde elabora y ofrece a su clientela los refrescos y gaseosas variadas.

El crédito que está solicitando en Ceprodel será utilizado para la compra de los diferentes ingredientes tales como azúcar, cacao, canela, semilla y una gran variedad de frutas que utiliza para preparar los riquísimos refrescos naturales para su clientela.

Se siente muy contenta con los créditos que Ceprodel le ha otorgado anteriormente ya que ha logrado incrementar su capital de trabajo y así ha podido mejorar su nivel de vida tanto el de ella como el de su familia.
texts.en:
Manuela Yolanda has a business selling natural soft drinks and sodas at the León bus terminal.  Her day starts at five in the morning when she goes to purchase the products she will use to make different types of natural soft drinks.  She later goes to her business where she makes and sells various soft drinks to her customers.

She will use the loan she is requesting from Ceprodel to buy different ingredients like sugar, cacao, cinnamon, seeds, and a great variety of fruit she uses to prepare delicious natural soft drinks for her customers.

She is very happy with the loans that Ceprodel has previously granted her.  She has managed to increase her working capital.  That way she has been able to improve her standard of living as much for herself as for her family.

loans.use: to buy cacao, sugar, seeds, cinnamon, different types and sizes of soft drinks, various juices, and fruits.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
María Lourdes es  propietaria de un negocio de venta de comida donde elabora diferentes tipos de deliciosos platillos a diario. Su día de trabajo empieza realizando sus compras desde las10 de la mañana en el mercado de León y posteriormente se traslada a su casa de habitación donde con mucho entusiasmo elabora y posteriormente  vende los diferentes y riquísimos platillos que tanto le gusta a sus clientes.

Actualmente está solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá directamente en la compra de arroz,frijoles, aceites, pollo, carne de res, ademásen la compra de cosméticos por catalogo que es otro tipo de negocio que esta empezando.Al obtener dicho crédito logrará obtener mejores ganancias y  diversificara su negocio para que de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida propia y la de su familia.

La señora María Lourdes está muy agradecida con Ceprodel ya que le ha ayudado a crecer en su negocioya quele han ayudado mucho a desarrollarse debido a que antes solo vendía ambulantemente la comida.
texts.en:
María Lourdes is the proprietress of a business selling food, where she makes different kinds of delicious dishes on a daily basis.  Her work day starts at 10 in the morning by making her purchases at the market in León.  She then transports them to her home where with great enthusiasm she prepares and later sells the different delicious dishes that her customers like so much.

She is currently requesting a loan which she will invest directly in the purchase of rice, beans, oil, chicken, beef, and also in purchasing cosmetics from a catalog, which is the other type of business that she is beginning.  Obtaining this loan will allow her to get greater earnings and diversify her business, and in this way she can improve the quality of her own life and that of her family.

Señora María Lourdes is very grateful to Ceprodel, as they have helped her to grow her business and have helped her greatly to develop it, as previously she only sold her food as a street vendor.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, chicken, plantains, beans and beef.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a 50-year-old lady from Siaya town, Western Kenya, and is married to Charles. They have six children aged between 6 and 27 years.

Rose operates a clothes-selling business in Siaya town, a business she has done for the last 27 years. She makes a monthly income of KES 15,000. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy bales of used clothing to sell. 

Rose will use her profits to grow the clothing business. Her dream is to diversify into big tender supplies to schools and colleges.

loans.use: To buy bales of used clothing for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a 40-year-old married man with six children who are all enrolled in school. His wife is a businesswoman who contributes to the provision of family basic needs. He lives in a rental house with electricity but no piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food for his family and school fees for his children. 

Richard has operated as a carpenter for the past 17 years; his potential clients are the local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the KES 25,000 he wants to purchase more timber and working tools for his business. He decided to join Yehu to access capital to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase more timber and working tools for his business.

loans.name: Tlayecac Group

texts.es: La nueva integrante del grupo es la señora Juana va a comprar con su prestamo dulces, paletas de caramelo, pelones, chicharrones, chocolates, mazapanes, bombones etc. las demas integrantes del grupo siguen en la actividad que vienen desarrollando. La señora Ambrosia tiene 45 años de edad, ella es soltera tiene 5 hijos 3 varones y 2 mujeres, un varón estudia la primaria y una adolescente estudia la secundaria, ella tiene una tienda de abarrotes, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar aceite, papel higiénico, suavitel, cloro, fabuloso, pino , huevo, jabón etc. ella inicio su negocio hace 5 años por necesidad su hijo construyo un cuarto y para ocupar el local, ella inicio con préstamos y con lo que le dio su hijo para surtir la tienda, su negocio es importante porque le gusta atender a sus clientes amablemente y tiene trabajo, ella utiliza las ganancia para los gastos de la luz elevada, su tienda es popular por la ubicación. Su negocio le ha ayudado en caso de enfermedad de su negocio toma para el doctor o las medicinas, ella está contenta con este préstamo que va a recibir lo va a invertir en mercancía para tener surtida su tienda y así brindarle mejor servicio a sus clientes. Sus sueños y esperanzas son que crezca su negocio y poderles dar estudios a sus hijos pequeños que logren una profesion. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad  “les damos las gracias por prestarnos para inyectarle fuerza a los negocios y a las familias".
texts.en:
The new group member is Señora Juana and she is going to use her loan to buy candy, caramel lollipops, pelons [a popular tamarind-flavored candy], pork scratchings, chocolates, marzipan, marshmallows etc. The other group members are continuing with the activities that they were previously carrying out.

Señora Ambrosia is 45 years old, she is single and she has 5 children - 3 boys and 2 girls. One of her boys is in primary school and one of the teenage girls is in secondary school. She has a grocery store and she is applying for her loan to buy oil, toilet paper, Suavitel [fabric softener], bleach, Fabuloso [all purpose cleaner], eggs, soap etc. She began her business 5 years ago. Out of necessity her son built her a room and in order to move into the premises, she began with loans and what her son gave her to stock the store. Her business is important because she enjoys serving her customers in a friendly way and having a job. She uses her profits to pay the high electricity bills. Her store is popular throughout the area. Her business has helped her in times of illness as she can pay for the doctor or for medicines. She is happy with the loan that she is receiving and she is going to invest it in merchandise to stock her store, therefore providing her customers with better service. Her hopes and dreams are for her business to grow and for her young children to have the opportunity to study for professional jobs. 

The members of the group wish to say the following to Kiva and to Fundación Realidad: "We thank you for lending to us so we can inject strength into our businesses and our families".

loans.use: to buy oil, toilet paper, napkins, fabric softener, bleach, all purpose cleaner, eggs, soap, candles etc.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
La señora  Catalina  es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de perfumes por catálogos y a la venta de mercancía de abarrotes.
Ella nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es ofrecerles a sus clientes los mejores  perfumes y tener sus pedidos a tiempo.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más perfumes  para la venta y para la compra de mas mercancía de abarrotes como es: jabon, leche, azucar, galletas, pan, aceite, manteca, frutas y verduras.
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla a seguir creciendo en lo que mas le gusta que es vender perfumes.
texts.en:
Catalina is a hardworking woman who sells perfume via catalogue and also sells grocery items.  She tells us that what she likes best about her business is offering her customers the best perfumes and to have their orders ready on time.

She requested the loan to buy more perfume to sell and to buy more grocery items like soap, milk, sugar, cookies, bread, oil, lard, fruit and vegetables.

She thanks the Fundación for helping her to continue growing in what she likes best which is selling perfume.

loans.use: to buy grocery items to resell.

loans.name: Madres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Madres Emprendedoras ,se conformo en febrero del 2010, gracias a que una de las integrantes logro formar el grupo que en la actualidad está conformada por 23 mujeres  quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 5º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. Es un grupo que se destaca por trabajo en conjunto y solidario que realizan.
Maria Benita es una de ellas, y nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de joyería. Este ha sido su medio de vida hace un tiempo ya, y gracias a este tiempo que lleva haciéndolo ya ha podido formarse una buena clientela que siempre le hace varios pedidos. Su meta es poder tener una tienda donde ofrecer las joyas que vende.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de pulseras, cadenas, anillos,  y demás tipos de joyas para la posterior venta a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group of women named "Madres Emprendedoras" ["Entrepreneurial Mothers"] was started in February 2010, thanks to one of the members who worked to form the group.  It is currently made up of 23 women who are working with great pleasure on their fifth lending cycle, and are together and united in the program.  It is a group that highlights being together and united in the work that they do.

Maria Benita is one of these women, and she tells us that she works selling jewelry.  This has been her means of earning a living for some time already, and thanks to the the time that she has spent doing this, she has been able to gain a good customer base who always place various orders with her.  Her goal is to be able to have a store where she can sell her jewelry.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of bracelets, necklaces, rings and other types of jewelry for sale to her customers.

loans.use: to buy rings, necklaces, bracelets and other types of jewelry.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renew his store and purchase some larger electrical appliances to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre, Mujeres Emprendedoras se conformó en mayo del 2006,y actualmente ya se encuentra el 19º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
El grupo tienen un excelente comportamiento de pago, y el trato entre ellas es memorable, gracias a esto y a su trabajo solidario siguen  adelante incrementando sus ingresos y  trabajando con el programa hasta estos días.
Norma es una de las miembros, y ella nos comenta que se dedica a la costura hace ya un buen tiempo. Este ha sido el trabajo que hace para poder mantener y ayudar a su familia con los gastos diarios. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora y da gracias a Dios siempre tiene mucho trabajo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, cierres, botones y demás insumos, con los cuales podrá seguir trabajando y cumplir con los pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
The group of women named "Mujeres Emprendedoras" ["Entrepreneurial Women"] was formed in May 2006, and they are currently in their 19th lending cycle.  They work together and united in their program.

The group has an excellent repayment record, and the way they treat each other is memorable. Thanks to this and to their work together, they are continuing to move forward in increasing their income and working with the program up to the current day.

Norma is one of these members, and she tells us that she has been working doing sewing for some time now.  This has been the work that has allowed  her to support and help her family with their daily expenses.  She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman, and thanks to God she always has a lot of work.

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of fabric, thread, zippers, buttons and other supplies, with which she can continue with her work and complete the orders that she has.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, zippers, buttons and other supplies.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero y reside con su madre y hermano en la aldea de Monquecagua, Intibucá.

Antonio aparte de estudiar, trabajaba con sus hermanos mayores en la agricultura, experiencia que le ayudo para poder independizarse con su propio  negocio de agricultura, específicamente a la producción del  cultivo de papa, la cual comercializa en el mercado local desde hace 12 años,  y le dedica diariamente 8 horas.

Es su primer crédito con ODEF, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de semilla de papa certificada,  ya que su meta es ampliar el nivel de producción, darle mejor asistencia  a sus cultivos, y mejorar sus ingresos,  con las utilidades obtenidas, él espera invertir en la construcción de su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Antonio is 28 years old.  He is single and lives with his mother and brother in the village of Monquecagua in Intibucá.

Aside from attending school, Antonio also worked with his older brothers in farming.  This experience helped him to be able to become independent with his own farming business, in particular growing potatoes, which he has been selling in the local market for the last 12 years.  He works eight hours a day.

This is his first loan with ODEF, which he will invest in the purchase of certified potato seeds, as his goal is to increase his level of production, to give better assistance to his crops, and to increase his income.  With the earnings obtained, he hopes to invest in building his own home.

loans.use: to purchase certified potato seeds.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
El comité “Santa Lucía” se encuentra en el décimo quinto ciclo del programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya, tiene 17 integrantes, de la zona de Asunción. Todas las integrantes ya realizan actividades productivas y también actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
 Lourdes es una mujer muy trabajadora y creativa, y lo demuestra con los hermosos Bijouterie que hace. Tiene variadas clases de ellos y comenta que es muy gustado por sus clientes, lo que le ayuda mucho, pues tiene buena venta. Comenta que al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero que ahora ya tiene buena clientela.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de perlas, lentejuelas, hilos, y demás insumos necesarios para seguir haciendo los Bijouteries que vende.
texts.en:
The Santa Lucía communal bank is in its 15th cycle of the Enterprising Women's Program of the Fundación Paraguaya.  It has 17 members and is in the Asunción area.  All of the members carry out productive activities.  They also carry out activities that strengthen their camaraderie.  

Lourdes is a very hard-working and creative woman.  This can be seen in the beautiful costume jewelry that she makes.  She has various kinds of jewelry, and she says that her customers really like the jewelry.  This helps her a lot because she has good sales.  She says that in the beginning it was a little difficult for her, but now she has a good clientele.

She is requesting the loan to buy pearls, sequins, thread, and other needed supplies to continue making the costume jewelry that she sells.

loans.use: to buy pearls, sequins, thread, and other supplies.

loans.name: Virgen  De Fátima Group

texts.es:
El comité inicio gracias a  la señora Irene, quien contacto con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. El comité se denomina “Virgen de Fátima”, está constituido  por  15  señoras muy activas y solidarias todas de la misma zona. Ellas hacen cada una, actividades independientes, pero también hacen actividades para ayudarse como grupo.
Gladys es muy sacrificada, ella nos cuenta que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, arreglando y a veces atendiendo ya su despensa. Tiene un negocio bien surtido con todo tipo de artículos de primera necesidad. Su meta es poder ampliar su despensa, y algún día poder tener un mini super.
Ella solicita la ayuda de fundación paraguaya y kiva para poder abastecer su negocio con productos de primera necesidad, como ser azúcar, fideos, arroz, y demás. Agradecen todas ellas por la oportunidad que les dan
texts.en:
This group was started thanks to Señora Irene, who reached out to her neighbors and friends to start a group in her area.  The group is called “Virgen de Fátima”, and is made up of 15 very active and supportive women, all from the same area.  Each one works independently but they also do activities to help themselves as a group.

Gladys is very self-sacrificing.  She tells us that everyday she works from very early in the morning getting her small store ready and sometimes serving there.  She has a well-stocked business with all types of every-day necessities.  Her goal is to be able to expand her store, and some day to be able to have a mini-supermarket.

She is requesting the help of Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva so as to be able to stock up her business with everyday items such as sugar, noodles, rice and additional things.  

All the members are grateful for the opportunity that is being given to them.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, noodles, rice and other items.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 26 years old and single. He is a small-scale farmer in Kapsabet and has been in operation for a period of one year, earning a monthly income of KES 2,000.

His loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD is his first term loan and he wishes to use this amount to purchase seeds in preparation for the planting season. The ploughed amount will be used to expand the farm for tilling.

He hopes to own a big farm and also a family.

loans.use: To purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Saltanat

texts.ru: Салтанат 46 лет, замужем, воспитывает троих детей. В 2006 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Салтанат начала свой бизнес в торговле канцелярскими  и хозяйственными товарами, использовав 10,000 сом (KGS) в качестве стартового капитала.  Практикуя выездную торговлю на рынке, Салтанат и ее муж приложили все усилия для развития бизнеса и добились успехов – на сегодня в товарообороте находится около 50,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день, ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, поэтому Салтанат обратилась в компанию «Бай  Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS). Закуп товаров позволит ей расширить ассортимент, увеличить количество клиентов и повысить продажи.  Доходы Салтанат планирует вложить в покупку машину, чтобы иметь возможность реализовывать свой товар в отдаленных селах.
texts.en: Saltanat is 46 years old, married and is raising three children.  In 2006, in search of an income source for her family, she started her own business of selling office and household goods, using a sum of 10,000 som (KGS) as an initial capital.  Traveling to a market to sell their merchandise, Saltanat and her husband put forth all their efforts to develop this business and achieved success.  Today, they have a goods turnover of about 50,000 som (KGS).  Currently, the goods selection is limited, and this is why Saltanat requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  Purchasing merchandise will allow her to expand the goods selection, increase the number of customers and increase sales.  Saltanat plans to invest the profits into purchasing a car in order to have an ability to sell her merchandise in remote villages.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of goods

loans.name: Muyassar

texts.ru: Муяссар занимается торговлей на рынке. Она имеет торговую точку, где продает продукты и хозяйственные товары. Ей 48 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж и сын находятся в Российской Федерации. Она берет кредит для покупки шоколада и конфет.
texts.en: Muyassar is involved in sales at a market.  She has a retail outlet, where she sells products and household goods.  She is 48 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband and son are in the Russian Federation.  Muyassar is requesting this loan to purchase chocolate and candy.

loans.use: to purchase chocolate and candy

loans.name: Hakimkhon

texts.ru: Хакимхон проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. Кроме того в свободное время Хакимхон работает строительными работами по найму. Он берет крелит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en: Hakimkhon lives in Vahdat. He is 54 years old, married and has five children. For the last five years he has been raising cattle for sale. During his free time Hakimkhon also works as a construction worker. He is taking out this loan in order to purchase additional calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Alma Ligia

texts.es:
La señora Alma Ligia  es  casada y se dedica a atender su negocio de venta de todo tipo de ropa el cual oferta muy entusiasmadamente en el mercado de León siendo dicho negocio con la que ha desarrollado su familia brindándole las condiciones pertinentes para que se desarrollen. 

Actualmente ella requiere comprar la mercancía entre la que se encuentra trajes de niños, toallas de baño, gorra, ropa interior, blusas y ropa de tierno para satisfacer a su clientela en precios y calidad, y así tener  la oportunidad de obtener mejores ingresos en el negocio.

Por este motivo, ella visitó Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para obtener los productos mencionados anteriormente y así seguir comercializándolos y satisfacer la demanda lo más pronto posible.

Es necesario mencionar que esta actividad la ejerce desde hace 2 años y tiene planes de continuar mejorando su negocio y confía que Ceprodel será la mano amiga que le impulsará a mejorarlo.
texts.en:
Alma Ligia is married and owns a business that sells all types of clothing, which she offers enthusiastically in the market of León. It is this business that has allowed her to take care of her family and provide the conditions needed for their growth and development.

Currently she needs to purchase merchandise including children’s and baby clothes, bath towels, hats, underwear, blouses and other clothing to meet customer demand.  This will provide her the opportunity for greater income in her business.

She visited Ceprodel seeking a loan in order to be able to obtain the products mentioned above, so that she can meet her customers’ needs as quickly as possible.

It is important to note that she has been engaged in this business for two years, and she has plans to continue improving her business, and she is confident that Ceprodel can act as the helping hand that she needs.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise including children’s and baby clothes, bath towels, hats, underwear, and blouses.

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en: Everlyne is a 27-year-old single woman. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a food retail business where she sells fish. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a fast growing area and her primary customers are residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds to improve the retail store. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more fish. Everlyne's business goal is to expand her business and have employees within five years.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Mumaram

texts.ru:
Мумарам  49 лет, воспитала двоих детей. В 2009 году Мумарам начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания.  Стартовав с суммой в 40,000 сом (KGS), и взяв в аренду магазин,  Мумарам сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме 20,000 сом.   
В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Мумарам обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS).  Мумарам мечтает открыть свой собственный магазин с продуктами.
texts.en: Mumaram is 49 years old and has raised two children. In 2009 she opened a grocery store using a starting capital of 40,000 som (KGS). Currently Mumaram rents a store space and her grocery business has a monthly profit of 20,000 som (KGS). In order to expand her inventory and offer her clients more choices, Mumaram has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS). In the future Mumaram dreams to own the store space she is currently renting.

loans.use: to expand the assortment of goods

loans.name: Abdusator

texts.ru: Абдусатор проживает в городе Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 46 лет. У него трое детей. Он имеет средне - специальное образование, строитель. По специальности он работает 10 лет. Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Он закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdusator lives in Vahdat. He is 46 years old, married and has three children. Abdusator has a professional degree as a construction worker and has been working in this field for more then 10 years. He also has a cattle business where he raises meat cattle for future resale at the market. Abdusator is taking out this loan to buy a few more calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru: Елена жительница района Яван. Ей 39 лет. Она разведена. У нее двое детей. Ее дети учатся в средней школе. Уже три года как она открыла дилерский центр, где пополняет баланс мобильных телефонов и продает диски. Она берет кредит для приобретения сим - карт.
texts.en: Elena is a resident of Yavan region. She is 39 years old, divorced and is raising two children. Her kids still attend school. For the last three years she has been managing a mobile phone booth where customers can refill the balances on their prepaid mobile phones as well as purchase CDs and DVDs. Elena is taking out this loan to purchase a batch of sim cards for mobile phones.

loans.use: to purchase sim cards

loans.name: Nasim

texts.ru: Насим проживает в городе Истаравшан. Ему 72 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Насим имеет среднее образование. Он занимается растениеводством. В основном он выращивает картошку для продажи. Кредит берет закупа семян картошки и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nasim lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 72 years old, married and has two children.  Nasim has a secondary education.  He is involved in agriculture.  He primarily grows potatoes for sale.  Nasim is requesting this loan to purchase potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Shamsiddin

texts.ru: Шамсиддин житель района Рудаки. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин, где он продает продукты питания. В этой области Шамсиддин восемь лет. Он берет кредит для покупки кондитерских изделий, вафель и конфет.
texts.en: Shamsiddin is a resident of the region Rudaki. He is 29 years old and married. His wife is a house wife. He works in retail. He owns a store, where he sells food. Shamsiddin has worked in this area for eight years. He takes a loan for the purchase of confectionery, wafers and candy.

loans.use: to purchase confectionary, wafers and candy

loans.name: Terry

texts.en:
Terry is 32 years old and the mother of one child who is 10 years old. She sells different items like instant shower and fridge guard. She has been in the business for the past seven years. She gets a monthly income of KES 95,000 from her business.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan to diversify the business by purchasing cosmetics to sell. She was introduced to KADET LTD by a KADET staff member. Her dream is to own a shopping mall in the next year.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Martin

texts.en:
Martin is a married man. He has two children aged 10 and 15. He describes himself to be determined, innovative, and kind. 

Martin operates a retail store where he sells items such as tissue paper, sugar, salt, rice, soap, etc. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a highly populated area and his primary customers are residents. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase more home products such as bread, flour, sugar, etc. to sell. Martin's business goal is to run a big supermarket within five years.

loans.use: to purchase more home products such as bread, flour, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Ilyos

texts.ru: Илёс житель города Истаравшан. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Он живет вместе с родителями. Илёс имеет среднее образование. Он занимается торговлей женской одежды. Этим видом бизнеса занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для покупки зимней женской одежды и обуви.
texts.en: Ilyos is a resident of Istravshan. He is 28 years old, married and has seven children. His family still lives with his parents. Ilyos has a high school degree and sells women's clothing from a stall at the market. He has been making a living in retail for the last five years. Ilyos is taking out this loan to purchase women's clothes and shoes for the winter season.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothes and shoes for women

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru:
Баходур житель города Истаравшан. Ему 34 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается скотоводством. Он у себя дома разводит крупнорогатый скот. В этой области он уже восемь лет. Кредит
берет для закупа двух телят.
texts.en: Bahodur lives in Istaravshan. He is 34 years old, married and has three children. His wife is a home maker and Bahodur supports the family by raising cattle. He raises calves at home for resale at the markets. Bahodur has eight years experience with this type of business. He is taking out this loan to purchase two more calves for his herd.

loans.use: to purchase two calves

loans.name: Tulkin

texts.ru: Тулкин более 12 лет занимается животноводством. Ему 40 лет. Он имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии он работает 15 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Тулкин берет кредит для закупа телят с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en:
Tulkin has been raising cattle for more then twelve years. He is a forty year old man and has earned a college degree in education. Tulkin has been working as an educator for the last 15 years and uses the cattle sales to supplement his income. Tulkin is married and is raising six children. He is taking out this loan to purchase additional calves for his herd.
|

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Salima

texts.en: Salima is 40 years old. She is married and has three children. She is engaged in an agriculture business to support her family. Salima has been selling milk and animals for 15 years and her frequent clients are butchers. She also sells chicken, eggs, and vegetables from her farm. She wants to obtain the loan of AZN 500 to buy a ram. She is planning to expand her business in the future, as she wants to give her children a good life. Salima hopes that you will help her to achieve her goals.

loans.use: To buy a ram.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a 40-year-old married man. His wife is a businesswoman who contributes to the provision of the family's basic needs. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family. 

Hamisi has operated a fruit and vegetable stall for the past four years; his potential clients are the local area residents. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the KES 30,000 he wants to purchase more stock of oranges, mangoes, tomatoes, onions, bananas, and carrots for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of oranges, mangoes, tomatoes, onions, bananas, and carrots for resale.

loans.name: Kulbayra

texts.ru:
Кулбайре 47 лет, замужем, воспитывает четырех детей.  Кулбайра работает бухгалтером в местной Ассоциации водопользователей и в качестве дополнительного заработка, занимается животноводством. Начав этот бизнес после развала Советского Союза с суммы 100 советских рублей , Кулбайра смогла развить хозяйство, насчитывающее 4 коровы, 5 баранов. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов позволяет Кулбайре зарабатывать  около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кулбайра обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойной коровы . Доходы Кулбайра планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота,  а в ближайшем будущем – посадить фасоль и картофель .
texts.en:
Kulbayra is 47 years old, married and is raising four children. She works as an accountant in the local water users association and raises livestock to supplement her salary. Kulbayra started this business using 100 soviet rubels shortly after the fall of the Soviet Union. Since then, Kulbayra's herd has expanded and now has four milk cows and five sheep and the dairy sales result in a monthly profit of 15,000 som (KGS).

In order to purchase another dairy cow, Kulbayra has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 45,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use the profits from additional dairy sales to buy even more animals as well as start planting beans and potatoes for sale.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Bozorboy

texts.ru: Бозорбой житель Яванского района. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Он занимается животноводством. В основном он откармливает и продает скот. Эти видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Бозорбой первый раз берет кредит в нашей организации с целью закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Bozorboy lives in Yavan region. He is 41 years old, married and has six children. For the last fifteen years Bozorboy has been raising cattle, mostly meat cattle for fattening and resale. This is the first time that Bozorboy has turned to Kiva for a loan, which he plans to use to purchase a few more calves for his business.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Asilkhan

texts.ru: Асилхан 59 лет. В 2000 году, в поисках источника финансирования своей семьи, Асилхан начала свой бизнес в разведении скота .Использовав стартовую сумму в 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, Асилхан сумела развить свое хозяйство, с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме около 2,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асилхан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы  и баранов для откорма и перепродажи. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Асилхан планирует увеличивать поголовье  скота.
texts.en: Asilkhan is 59 years old. She has started her livestock business back in 2000, using 30,000 som (KGS) to purchase a few animals. Since then Asilkhan's herd grew and the profits from this business are about 2,000 som (KGS) monthly. In order to buy more cows and sheep for her herd, Asilkhan has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS). In the future, using the profits from this loan Asilkhan wants to continue expanding her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock
